title: How to Play Pixelmon in Minecraft PE

steps.title: Understand that the mod is only available on Minecraft Java.
steps.content: Understand that the mod is only available on Minecraft Java. Unfortunately, the Pixelmon mod is not available on Minecraft PE. Here you can find the version for Minecraft Java 1.12.2 or 1.16.5.

steps.title: Try an alternative for Minecraft Bedrock.
steps.content: Try an alternative for Minecraft Bedrock. If you want to play with Pokémons on Minecraft Bedrock, there is a solution. Try the SERP Pokédrock addon. This is the most popular Pokémons addon on Minecraft Bedrock.

steps.title: Understand what parts the addon has.
steps.content: Understand what parts the addon has. The SERP Pokédrock addon has several parts. You can install only gen1 or gen2, or both. Base: addon core (always required) Gen1: the first generation of Pokémons Gen2: the second generation of Pokémons Gen3: the third generation of Pokémons

steps.title: Download the addon.
steps.content: Download the addon. In this article we will show the installation of gen1 only. Open the article SERP Pokédrock. The addon is published at the following links: ModBay: a great up-to-date guide on SERP Pokédrock with files MCPEDL: outdated article SerpZacek.com: author's website

steps.title: Download base and gen1.
steps.content: Download base and gen1. Open the main article for gen1. Moving on to the files. It is necessary to download all behavior and resource files (base and gen1). It's a long time, but it's all necessary.

steps.title: Find the downloaded files.
steps.content: Find the downloaded files. We have downloaded 3 files, you need to import them into Minecraft. Open the file manager. Find the downloaded files. You may have downloaded .mcpack.zip or .mcaddon.zip files. Rename them to .mcpack or .mcaddon .

steps.title: Import files.
steps.content: Import files. Click on the file for a long time, click Open As. Important: The process of importing files may differ on different devices.

steps.title: Open with Minecraft.
steps.content: Open with Minecraft. Open the file with Minecraft.

steps.title: Check for a message about successful import.
steps.content: Check for a message about successful import. You need to make sure that the file has been imported successfully. In the game, you will see a pop-up “Import Completed” or “Import Successful”. If the import failed, try updating Minecraft to the latest version.

steps.title: Repeat the steps with the rest of the files.
steps.content: Repeat the steps with the rest of the files. It is necessary to repeat the steps with the remaining 3 files. Each file needs to be imported into Minecraft.

steps.title: Start the game.
steps.content: Start the game. Let's move on to creating the world. Click Play .

steps.title: Start the creation of the world.
steps.content: Start the creation of the world. Click the Create New and Create New World buttons.

steps.title: Open the Behavior Packs section.
steps.content: Open the Behavior Packs section. Go to the Behavior Packs section. Next, click My packs .

steps.title: Activate Behavior Packs.
steps.content: Activate Behavior Packs. Activate both packs.

steps.title: Activate Resource Packs.
steps.content: Activate Resource Packs. Do the same with Resources Packs.

steps.title: Activate experimental options.
steps.content: Activate experimental options. In order for the addon to work, you need to activate all experimental options in the Game section.

steps.title: Create the map.
steps.content: Create the map. Click the Create button.

steps.title: Done!
steps.content: Done! Now you can start playing with Pokémon.

steps.title: Activate Button A.
steps.content: Activate Button A. After creating the map, you will receive Button A. Activate this button.

steps.title: Choose from the three different Pokémon.
steps.content: Choose from the three different Pokémon. You will be offered a choice of starter kits with one of the Pokémon: Bulbasaur Charmander Squirtle

steps.title: Move your starter kit Pokémon.
steps.content: Move your starter kit Pokémon. You will receive a starter kit. It is necessary to move the Pokémon to one of the six slots in the inventory.

steps.title: Activate Pokédex.
steps.content: Activate Pokédex. Pokémenu will open. Open the Pokémon section.

steps.title: Summon Pokémon.
steps.content: Summon Pokémon. Summon Bulbasaur Pokémon in the first slot.

steps.title: Done!
steps.content: Done! Pokémon is summoned and ready to protect you!

steps.title: Learn about other features.
steps.content: Learn about other features. Currently, the most detailed guide on the SERP Pokédrock addon can be found here . In addition, you can also: Catching Pokémon Train Pokémon Fight with trainers Find Pokéstore and many other features…

steps.title: Install the Gen2 version.
steps.content: Install the Gen2 version. You can install this version if you'd like. This is a different list of Pokémon, but with the same features. Gen1, Gen2 and Gen3 can be installed simultaneously. Gen2 information and files can be found here: ModBay: guide and files SERP Pokédrock Gen2 MCPEDL: less detailed article SerpZacek.com : author's website

steps.title: Install the Gen3 version.
steps.content: Install the Gen3 version. Gen3 information and files can be found here: ModBay: guide and files SERP Pokédrock Gen3 MCPEDL: less detailed article
